alert.note: Alert for Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 28 at 11:40AM PST until January 01 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches possible, except 1 to 2 feet above 7000 feet. * WHERE...Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties. * WHEN...From late Friday night through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy rainfall is likely on Friday for most elevations, with the exception of areas above 7,000 feet which may see a mixture of rain and/or heavy wet Sierra cement.
info.instruction: Now is the time to prepare an emergency kit for your home and car. If traveling consider alternate plans, remember to carry tire chains, extra food, water and clothing. Once the storm arrives, travel may be difficult or impossible for an extended period of time.
